text: Identify the top 3 Buyer Personas based on these reviews. Focus on why they need our service, emotions they express, and what life circumstances, or situations trigger their decision to buy.
label: 👥 Client Personas

text: Write a StoryBrand style BrandScript based on these customer interviews
label: 📖 StoryBrand

text: Craft a larger-purpose Mission our community can invest in emotionally. How are we making the world better? Deliver a short compelling mission that our community can feel inspired to get behind. State the mission in a short, compelling headline, and provide any additional elements as needed
label: 🚀 Mission

text: Write 10 FAQs and answers for our website
label: ❓ FAQ

text:
Create 3 Facebook Ads using the How It Works Framework. Pick 3 results about our product and write in this format:

How to use [product/service]:
[emoji] step 1
[emoji] step 2
[emoji] step 3
Call to Action

(keep each step under 50 characters and start line with an emoji)
label: 1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣ Three Step Ad

text:
Create 3 Facebook Ads using the Use Case Bullet List Framework. Pick use cases for our company and write in this format:

The perfect [type of product] for . . .
[emoji] use case 1
[emoji] use case 2
[emoji] use case 3
[emoji] use case 4
Call to Action

(Keep each use case on it's own line less than 50 characters)
label: 🎯 Use Case Ad

text: Create a sales page in the style of FuckJerry. Be humorous and engaging while detailing the benefits of working with Results.
label: 🧨 Outrageous Meme Salespage

text: Using the ‘Problem-Agitate-Solve’ framework, please write a copy that identifies the most painful problem faced by customers and agitates the issue to show why it is a bad situation. Then, present our product/service as the logical solution to the problem
label: 👿 PAS Framework

text: Create 10 Fun T-Shirt Slogans about our Company
label: 👕 T-Shirt Slogans
